text: Dodul (known as Master Dodul) is a Bangladeshi film actor. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Child Artist for the film Lakhe Ekta (1990). ==Selected films== * Lakhe Ekta - 1990 * Shilpi - 1995 * Hangor Nodi Grenade - 1997 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Dodul
